snippet.title: Turnabout Substitution (Trailer)
snippet.description:
When the city's most famous judge gets arrested on suspicion of murdering an infamous serial killer, he has no one to turn to but rookie attorney Apollo Justice. But is he up to the task? Can he find the truth on his own? And, above all, can he face it? Prepare for a mind-bogglingly intricate plot filled with suspense and unsuspected twists!

This is the trailer for the Ace Attorney fangame Turnabout Substitution, which is intended to be Apollo's "Rise from the Ashes".

It is FREE. The download and more information can be found at the website http://turnaboutsub.weebly.com/

The original uploader of the trailer took it down, so I'm putting it back up. Give this game a play if you haven't!


Ace Attorney is owned by Capcom.
